# VirtualScroller.el() method

Start/finish observing size of `element` at `index`<!-- -->. Observing is finished if element is `null`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
el(index: number, element: HTMLElement | null): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

index


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

item index


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

element


</td><td>

HTMLElement \| null


</td><td>

element for item


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

If an item was registered like `el(5, HTMLElement)` - it must be killed with `el(5, null)` before killing the instance.
